meanings.definition: A person who breaks the law.
meanings.sent1: The lawbreakers were caught stealing from the store.
meanings.sent2: Police officers work hard to catch lawbreakers and keep the community safe.
meanings.sent3: The lawbreakers tried to sneak past the security guard but got caught red-handed.
meanings.sent4: In a society without consequences, lawbreakers would roam freely, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lawbreakers being handcuffed and taken away stayed in my mind.

meanings.sent1: The city was plagued by lawbreakers who refused to follow traffic rules.
meanings.sent2: Law enforcement agencies work together to apprehend lawbreakers and bring them to justice.
meanings.sent3: The lawbreakers thought they could outsmart the system, but justice caught up with them.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the law, all lawbreakers are equal, regardless of their status.
meanings.sent5: The news report highlighted the increasing number of lawbreakers in the city.
